name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wordy Mojo, A Text Utility Extension

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for text utility functions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever catch yourself saying things like, "I know words, I have the best words"...? If not, you're in luck! 
Wordy Mojo is a simple extension that counts words from your pasted text, converts to uppercase or lowercase, and even gives you placeholder text as a Lorem Ipsum generator. Plus, the word count function even highlights character count and paragraph count too. Wordy Mojo is the perfect little extension for the aspiring writer, content creator, social media manager, or expert wordsmith.
